duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide world class customer service and exceed customer expectations in a pharmacy setting.
Maximize controllable profit, minimize expenses, and ensure compliance with company and regulatory standards.
Administer immunizations, dispense medications, and review prescriptions for accuracy and compliance.
Evaluate new and existing medications for drug interactions and maintain appropriate day supply.
Ensure compliance with state and federal laws and guidelines, including HIPAA and fraud, waste, and abuse.
Maintain records, reports, and quality assurance procedures in the pharmacy.
Ensure the safety of employees and patients, and maintain a clean and organized pharmacy space.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Pharmacy or PharmD. Previous experience preferred.
